attributes.action: Make birth marriage and death certificates availble on line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the successful launch of the census returns on line. could this be extended to cover the certificates which genealogists find most useful? I am not advocating a free service, rather a subscription similar to the current procedures regarding the census. i understand that these certificates are or will be digitised shortly, and it would benefit all parties involved.
